General.Name: Korea Pharmacy Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Korea Pharmacy Co., Ltd. produces pharmaceutical drugs. It offers amino acid, antibiotic, antidotal, antiepileptic, antihistamine, anti-inflammatory, antimicrobial, antiplatelet, circulatory system, CNS, dermatological, endocrine, gastrointestinal, hepatic, hormonal, respiratory, sympathomimetic, and specialty drugs, as well as multivitamins, skeltal muscle relaxants, vitamin B1, etc. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
